metadata.name: Glamour-X Magazine, July 1993 edition cover
metadata.description:
Glamour-X is a fictional magazine in the world of Non-Fungible Albums. The July 1993 edition features Amber Chandler on the cover, with two pages of photographs and an interview.

Amber Chandler is most known for her album "Late Promises" in the world of Non-Fungible Albums.
